ComicInfo.Title: In Pictopia!; Those Wild and Mixed Up Locas; And Speaking of Those Abstract Pretentious Stories That Make You Feel Stupid If You Don't Get Them...; Chrysalis; Walt Disney Lives
ComicInfo.Summary:
Nocturno strolls through the deconstructed ruins of the comic industry
Rand takes Maggie out to a restaurant in an effort to patch up their loose ends. Unfortunately, Maggie's insecurities get in the way.
Walt Disney's corpse is resuscitated from its cryogenically frozen state in 1982. He promptly takes over the country, moves the White House to Anaheim and replaces everyone in the country with animatronic robots.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:03:12. [Issue ID 42154]
